title: My brother has started ending phone calls with "I love you"

author: noteducatedenough
text: The more I'm on here, the more I'm starting to realize all the "little" things that really messed me up.  The "I love you" thing sounds so weird.  I'm going to have to try that with my sister.  We're both so cold and cut off from emotion it's scary.  Thank you guys for being a reminder of the work done, and the work that needs to be done.  This place actually helps me out.  Lol

author: Cazzah
text: Try a big, genuine hug, too.
